2.「……そうですか。これは 父からの……。| 私が 母と おそろいのペンダントがほ: So this is from my father. He remembered that|I said I wanted a matching pendant like my|mother.

3.「ありがとうございます。<pc>さん。| 一生の宝物にすると 父に伝えてください: Thank you so much<pc>. I'll let my|father know I will cherish it forever.

4.「もう二度と 父とは| 連絡を取ることもないと 思っていましたが| こうして 覚: I never saw my father again nor hear from|him for a long time. I don't think he'd|remember me looking like this.

5.「すっかり 切れたと思っていたのに | 人の縁というものは 不思議なものですね…: I thought he cut me off, but human|relationships are strange thing..

7.「あなたが 父の所から来たということは| <kyodai>とは もう 再会を果た: I'm sure you came from my father's place|which means you and <kyodai> reunited|and received the flowers?

9.「もしや <kyodai>に 会ってないのですか？ | ……では <kyodai: You haven't seen <kyodai> yet? Then why|don't you take what <kyodai> was going|to give to my father.

10.「……なんと！ 受け取ってないと？| となると 父が <kyodai>から| 託: I'm surprised! You mean you didn't get them?|Then again, my father may have forgotten|<kyodai> was supposed to give them to him.

11.「……<pc>さん。 | 私は この世界で もっとも長く| あなたの<kyoda: <pc>, I've been around longer than most|people. I spent a lot of time with your|<kyodai_rel3>.

12.「まさか あなたが <kyodai>と会うより早く| ここへ来るとは 思いません: I didn't think you'd get here faster than|<kyodai>. but let me tell you our life|story..

13.「６０年ほど前のこと。一流の錬金術師になった| あの人は エテーネの村の巫女に:
60 years ago, my father became a first-rate|alchemist and was asked by a priestess in|the Village of Ethene to make a|
|certain flower..

14.「その花作りは 危険をともなうと 巫女から| 忠告されたそうです。あの人は 私た: The priestess advised him that making the|flowers was dangerous. He should leave|the island to avoid an accident.

15.「……しかし 私はそれを見逃さなかったのです。| <kyodai>から事情を聞き: <kyodai> told me everything and I knew|it would take an extraordinary amount of|effort to make the flower.

16.「父が <kyodai>にゆずった| ナルビアの家を売り…… 当面の生活費と|:
I sold the house in Nalbia that my father|gave to and we left the island|to make ends meet and continue our|
|research.

17.「思い切ったことをしたものですが……| 言えば 父にも 危険がおよぶと思い| 何: It was a drastic thing to do, but I did it|without telling my father because I felt|it would be dangerous if I told him.

18.「そして 花作りの研究を進めてゆくと| 巫女の予言通り ひたいにイレズミを入れた:
As we continued our flower research, a man|with a peculiar marking on his forehead|came after us just as the priestess|
|had predicted.

19.「私たちは あの男が現れるたびに| 各地を転々としながら 研究を続けたのですが|: We had to move from place to place, but this|man was very vindictive and persistent.

20.「これ以上 私を巻き添えにできないと判断した| <kyodai>は 私を この島: For my protection, <kyodai> evacuated|me to this island by myself.

21.「本当は 最後まで 一緒にいたかった……。| ですが <kyodai>の必死な表: I really wanted to stay with them, but the|desperate look on <kyodai>'s face made|me promise to stay here.

22.「それ以来…… 私は ここで| <kyodai>の無事と あの研究が完成し| 花: Since then, I hoped <kyodai> well and|made sure my research on the flowers|make it to their hands.

23.「そんなある日…… １０年ほど前でしたか。 | ……<kyodai>から 手紙が: Then one day about 10 years ago, a letter|arrived from <kyodai>.

24.「そこには 無事に 花が完成したことと| その花へ至るカギを 私の父 イッショウ: They said the flower has successfully|bloomed and that it was sent to my|father Isshou.

25.「<kyodai>は あなたを待っているはずです。| 父の所へ戻ったら <kyo: I'm sure <kyodai> is waiting for you.|When you get back to my father's, can|you ask him about <kyodai>?

26.「そして…… 私が 勝手にナルビアの家を売り| くわしい事情を話さずに 島を出た: And please tell my father that I apologize|for selling the house in Nalbia and|leaving the island without telling him.
